casebody.data:
John Richardson & Co., Libelant-Appellee, v. THE Steamship TEESBRIDGE, etc., North of England, Steamship Co., Limited, Claimant-Respondent-Appellant. No. 281. Circuit Court of Appeals Second Circuit. April 7, 1930. Kirlin, Woolsey, Campbell, Hiekox, Keating & MeGrann, of New York City (L. De Grove Potter and John J. Heckman, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Single & Single, of New York City (Alonzo L. Tyler, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
